column5: After reading Gerritt's "cat hunting post", I thought I'd share....  My oldest (Evan - 4) went fishing Monday at the baby sitter's, and called me at work so excited he caught two "HUGE" fish.  After I saw the pictures, I agreed:       And then there is Joah.....he's 22 months.  He put on this helment a few weeks ago, and luck would have it, I had the video camera ready - make sure the sound is up so you can hear him grunt!!.  Now that we've got DSL in the new-to-us home, I can upload for all to share!  Kids are so much fun....and I've got boy #3 coming any day now!!

OMG....LOL....HAHAHAHA....  That video is just classic....I think I can see a 10,000 dollar cheque from America's Funniest Home Videos!!!  And your oldest caught some NICE fish too!!  Thanks for the laughs  bly
Ok...bly just showed me this thread...  That is one of the funniest things I've ever seen!!! Gotta sign him up for football now!!  Tell Evan congrats from bly and I...those are some nice Bluegills!!!
That was awesome Dustin!  Not sure what was funnier, your little guy or your infectious laugh. Congrats on number 3! Keep us posted!
